module.name: Dialplan Injection
module.description: Acts as a dialplan destination and can execute a variety of Asterisk commands
module.changelog: *1.0.0* Issabel Foundation release for IssabelPBX 2.12 Lorne Gaetz: Initial commit
module.attention: This is an advanced module, and you should not use it without understanding asterisk dialplans! This is meant as a convenience tool for someone who would have had to resort to config editing. If you experience problems with it, just disable it and no harm done.
